item.description:
With the cold weather an assortment of winter waterfowl gather in a small stretch of the Charles River every year

We should have plenty of Mallards which are always here also Ring Necked ducks hooded merganzers and Common Merganzers we may also see goldeneye and there is always a surprize or two on the river

there are several vantage points along the strech so we can spread out if neccesatary

we will meet in the Shaws Parking lot on River St in Waltham and we will meet in the right hand side of the lot towards the back where the entrance to the riverwalk is
item.name: Winter Ducks along the Charles River in Waltham
